app_description: Drawing Desk Key Features: Draw on whiteboard blank canvas or your photos pictures images with Pen Line Arrow Rect Stroke Rect Fill Ellipse Stroke Ellipse Fill Eraser. Edit your photos pictures images with Filter Adjustment Effect Blur Focus Rotate Draw Splash Crop Resize ToneCurve Sticker Emotions Text. Draw everything what you want with the tools and colors what you like. Custom the size 0 50 of your drawing tools. Custom the alpha 0 1 of your drawing colors. Undo Redo Clear and Wipe off drawing actions. Add blank paper to your canvas restart your drawings. Change the background color by pressing on the ColorsPicker. Remember your last used marker colors and sizes and your canvas color. Import photos from your album or take pictures through camera or choose images from template to trace annotate and have fun with them. Save your drawings to your Photos Library. Print your drawings to AirPrint enabled printers. Draw together and share with your friends and family through the social media app. Just send your drawing to them and they can open it and draw on it too and then send it back. Please rate it to support us to do better and for more people can find download use and enjoy it. Please share it with your friends and family members to help for getting the word out. Please send email to us in app and let us know how you use it also send us your drawings questions concerns and feedbacks. Our simple goal is just to make the funny and easy to use this drawing and editing app for kids and everyone who like drawing and editing. We will go on to improve it with your reviews feedbacks supports. We will be so happy if you and someone you know who both enjoy using it.
